property.name: printerList
property.shortdesc: Available printers.

property.name: ppdList
property.shortdesc: Available PPDs.

property.name: paperSizeList
property.shortdesc: A list of the available paper sizes.

property.name: screeningList
property.shortdesc: Lists the ink screenings available in the PPD. Note: Valid only when color output is separations or in rip separations.

property.name: isValid
property.shortdesc: Returns true if the object specifier resolves to valid objects.

property.name: parent
property.shortdesc: The parent of the PrintBookletPrintPreference &#40;a Document).

property.name: events
property.shortdesc: A collection of events.

property.name: eventListeners
property.shortdesc: A collection of event listeners.

property.name: printer
property.shortdesc: The current printer. Can return: Printer enumerator or String.

property.name: ppd
property.shortdesc: The PPD, specified as a PPD name or an enumeration. Can return: PPDValues enumerator or String.

property.name: printFile
property.shortdesc: The PostScript file to print to. Note: Valid only when the current printer is defined as postscript file.

property.name: copies
property.shortdesc: The number of copies to print. Note: Not valid when printer is PostScript File.

property.name: collating
property.shortdesc: If true, collate printed copies.

property.name: reverseOrder
property.shortdesc: If true, prints pages in reverse order.

property.name: printNonprinting
property.shortdesc: If true, prints non-printing objects. Note: Valid only when trapping is off.

property.name: printBlankPages
property.shortdesc: If true, prints blank pages. Note: Valid only when trapping is off.

property.name: printGuidesGrids
property.shortdesc: If true, prints visible guides and baseline grids. Note: Valid only when trapping is off.

property.name: paperSize
property.shortdesc: The paper size, specified as either a string or an enumeration. For information on paper size names, see paper size list. Can return: PaperSizes enumerator or String.

property.name: paperHeight
property.shortdesc: The paper height. Note: Valid only when paper size is custom or scale mode is scale width height. Can return: PaperSize enumerator or Unit.

property.name: paperWidth
property.shortdesc: The paper width. Note: Valid only when paper size is custom or scale mode is scale width height. Can return: PaperSize enumerator or Unit.

property.name: paperOffset
property.shortdesc: The amount of space to offset the page from the left edge of the imageable area.

property.name: paperGap
property.shortdesc: The space between document pages on the printing medium.

property.name: paperTransverse
property.shortdesc: If true, uses transverse orientation.

property.name: printPageOrientation
property.shortdesc: The orientation of the printed page.

property.name: pagePosition
property.shortdesc: The position of the page on the printing medium. Note: Valid only when tile is false.

property.name: scaleMode
property.shortdesc: The policy for scaling the page. Note: Valid only when printing from Layout view.

property.name: scaleWidth
property.shortdesc: The amount &#40;as a percentage)  that the page width is scaled during printing. (Range: 0 to 1000) Note: Valid only when scale mode is scale width height.

property.name: scaleHeight
property.shortdesc: The amount &#40;as a percentage) that the page height is scaled during printing. (Range: 0 to 1000) Note: Valid only when scale mode is scale width height.

property.name: scaleProportional
property.shortdesc: If true, constrains the proportions of the scaling; uses the most recent value for either scale width or scale height to define both values. Note: Valid only when scale mode is scale width height.

property.name: printLayers
property.shortdesc: The layers to print.

property.name: allPrinterMarks
property.shortdesc: If true, prints all printer marks. If false, prints specified printer marks.

property.name: cropMarks
property.shortdesc: Prints crop marks that define where the page should be trimmed.

property.name: bleedMarks
property.shortdesc: If true, print bleed marks.

property.name: registrationMarks
property.shortdesc: If true, prints small targets outside the page area for aligning color separations.

property.name: colorBars
property.shortdesc: If true, add small squares of color representing the CMYK inks and tints of gray in 10% increments.

property.name: pageInformationMarks
property.shortdesc: If true, prints the filename, page number, current date and time, and color separation name.

property.name: markType
property.shortdesc: The type of printer marks, either an enum value or the name of a custom marks file. Can return: MarkTypes enumerator or String.

property.name: markLineWeight
property.shortdesc: The stroke weight &#40;in points) for printer marks.

property.name: markOffset
property.shortdesc: The distance to offset the page marks from the edge of the page.

property.name: useDocumentBleedToPrint
property.shortdesc: If true, uses the bleed area set for the document.

property.name: bleedTop
property.shortdesc: The height of the bleed area at the top of the page. Note: Valid only when use document bleed to print is true.

property.name: bleedBottom
property.shortdesc: The height of the bleed area at the bottom of the page. Note: Valid only when use document bleed to print is true.

property.name: bleedInside
property.shortdesc: The width of the bleed area at the inside of the page. Note: Valid only when use document bleed to print is true.

property.name: bleedOutside
property.shortdesc: The width of the bleed area at the outside of the page. Note: Valid only when use document bleed to print is true.

property.name: bleedChain
property.shortdesc: If true, forces all bleed area settings to be the same, using the most recent bleed measurement setting. If false, allows bleed top, bleed bottom, bleed inside, and bleed outside to have different measurements.

property.name: colorOutput
property.shortdesc: The color output mode for composites. Note: Not valid when a device-independent PPD is specified.

property.name: textAsBlack
property.shortdesc: If true, prints all text as black unless text has the color None or Paper or a color value that equals white. If false, prints colored text, such as blue hyperlinks, in halftone patterns. Note: Valid only when trapping is off.

property.name: trapping
property.shortdesc: The type of trapping.

property.name: flip
property.shortdesc: The direction in which to flip the printed image.

property.name: negative
property.shortdesc: If true, prints the document as a negative.

property.name: screening
property.shortdesc: The ink screening settings for composite gray output in PostScript or PDF format. . Can return: Screeening enumerator or String.

property.name: compositeAngle
property.shortdesc: The screen angle to use when printing composites. &#40;Range: 0 to 360) Note: Valid only for PostScript or PDF files that use custom screening.

property.name: compositeFrequency
property.shortdesc: The screen frequency to use when printing composites. &#40;Range: 1 to 500) Note: Valid only for PostScript or PDF files that use custom screening.

property.name: simulateOverprint
property.shortdesc: If true, simulates the effects of overprinting spot inks with different neutral density values by converting spot colors to process colors for printing. Note: Not valid when the color output mode is defined to leave color profiles unchanged.

property.name: printCyan
property.shortdesc: If true, prints the cyan ink. Note: Valid only when trapping is off.

property.name: cyanAngle
property.shortdesc: The angle override for cyan ink. &#40;Range: 0 to 360)

property.name: cyanFrequency
property.shortdesc: The frequency override for cyan ink. &#40;Range: 1 to 500)

property.name: printMagenta
property.shortdesc: If true, prints the magenta ink. Note: Valid only when trapping is off.

property.name: magentaAngle
property.shortdesc: The angle override for magenta ink. &#40;Range: 0 to 360)

property.name: magentaFrequency
property.shortdesc: The frequency override for magenta ink. &#40;Range: 1 to 500)

property.name: printYellow
property.shortdesc: If true, prints the yellow ink. Note: Valid only when trapping is off.

property.name: yellowAngle
property.shortdesc: The angle override for yellow ink. &#40;Range: 0 to 360)

property.name: yellowFrequency
property.shortdesc: The frequency override for yellow ink. &#40;Range: 1 to 500)

property.name: printBlack
property.shortdesc: If true, prints the black ink. Note: Valid only when trapping is off.

property.name: blackAngle
property.shortdesc: The angle override for black ink. &#40;Range: 0 to 360)

property.name: blackFrequency
property.shortdesc: The frequency override for black ink. &#40;Range: 1 to 500)

property.name: sendImageData
property.shortdesc: The image data sent to the printer or file.

property.name: fontDownloading
property.shortdesc: Controls how fonts are downloaded to the printer.

property.name: downloadPPDFonts
property.shortdesc: If true, downloads all fonts listed in the selected PPD. Valid only when font downloading is complete or subset.

property.name: postscriptLevel
property.shortdesc: The PostScript level of the printer.

property.name: dataFormat
property.shortdesc: The format in which to send image data to the printer.

property.name: sourceSpace
property.shortdesc: The source of the color management system. Note: Valid only when use color management is true.

property.name: profile
property.shortdesc: The color profile. Can return: Profile enumerator or String.

property.name: crd
property.shortdesc: The color-rendering dictionary &#40;CRD), specified as a CRD name or an enumeration value. Note: Valid only when use color management is true. Can return: ColorRenderingDictionary enumerator or String.

property.name: intent
property.shortdesc: The rendering intent. Note: Valid only when use color management is true.

property.name: preserveColorNumbers
property.shortdesc: If true, preserves uncalibrated color numbers.

property.name: opiImageReplacement
property.shortdesc: If true, prints graphics that are either OPI comments stored in imported EPS files or linked using OPI comments. For information on linking files using OPI comments, see omit EPS, omit PDF, or omit bitmaps.

property.name: omitEPS
property.shortdesc: If true, replaces EPS images with OPI links.

property.name: omitPDF
property.shortdesc: If true, replaces PDF images with OPI links.

property.name: omitBitmaps
property.shortdesc: If true, replaces bitmap images with OPI links.

property.name: flattenerPresetName
property.shortdesc: The name of the transparency flattener preset.

property.name: ignoreSpreadOverrides
property.shortdesc: If true, ignores flattener spread overrides.

property.name: bitmapPrinting
property.shortdesc: If true, uses bitmap printing.

property.name: bitmapResolution
property.shortdesc: The resolution for bitmap printing. &#40;Range: 72 to 1200) Note: Valid when bitmap printing is true.

property.name: activePrinterPreset
property.shortdesc: The current printer preset type. Can return: PrinterPresetTypes enumerator or PrinterPreset.

property.name: properties
property.shortdesc: A property that allows setting of several properties at the same time.

method.name: toSource
method.shortdesc: Generates a string which, if executed, will return the PrintBookletPrintPreference.

method.name: getElements
method.shortdesc: Resolves the object specifier, creating an array of object references.

parameter.name: handler
parameter.shortdesc: The event handler. Can accept: File or JavaScript Function.

parameter.name: handler
parameter.shortdesc: The registered event handler. Can accept: File or JavaScript Function.
